name: Banana Pancakes 🥗
description: Whip up a scrumptious stack of Banana Pancakes for a delightful twist on a classic breakfast favorite. These fluffy flapjacks are bursting with natural sweetness and will have you flipping for more!
instructions: Mix in the egg, then vanilla and cinnamon.
Pour pancake batter in ¼ cup (60 ml) amounts on a griddle or skillet over medium-high heat.
Cook until bubbles pop on the surface of the pancake, then flip and cook the other side.
